name: Eternal Lands Map File
summary: Learn about .ELM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ELM files are often distributed with .GZ compression and use the ".elm.gz" compound file extension.

description: Game file used by Eternal Lands, a free fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG); contains information about modifiable 2D and 3D objects for the map; used in conjunction with a .BMP file, which colors the map and defines locations.
